EmailTemplate.name: UC Library Initiative
EmailTemplate.subject: UC Library Initiative
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Upper Campus Parents,
We are pleased to announce that the Upper Campus Library is considering launching a new initiative whereby parents and children can spend time together in our library after school. If the response is favourable and logistically feasible, the scheme may become a regular fixture in our schoolâ€™s calendar.
For more information please click here.
If you have any queries please do not hesitate to get in touch with us.
Have a nice weekend.
Kind regards,
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
